biotools.summary: Tool that enables the user to quickly generate high-quality graphical maps of circular DNA sequences. Though especially designed and optimized for the display of small organelle genomes like the chloroplast or mitochondrial genome, it is applicable to all circular DNA sequences. The input data can be provided as GenBank files or GenBank accession numbers.

bioschemas.name: OGdraw
